result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marques E Zarate

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Marques E Zarate in court with attorney Gretchen G. Rosenke.  Defendant Marques E Zarate in custody.  Robert Scott Repischak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Katie Giebel.
15CM638 will be DRI as part of the negotiations with the felony matters. The State is in compliance with Ch. 950. Parties have reviewed PSI. No additions or corrections noted by parties. In 15cf576, Ct 1 - 2 yrs WPS bifurcated as 1 yr IC, 1 yr ES; Ct 2- 2 yrs IC 3 yrs es consec, Ct 5: 1 yr IC, 1 yr ES - I/S - 2 yrs probation. 15CF680, Ct 1: 1 yr IC, 1 yr ES/STAYED - 2 yrs conc probation; No contact w/victims unless approved by agent and victims, no alc/cs except by Rx-UA's, FT emp.

BTC: 15CM638 is dismissed and read in.
         15CF576, Ct 1 - Total sentence is 2 yrs WPS bifurcated as 1 yr IC, 1 yr ES, conc with Ct 2
                          Ct 2 - Total sentence is 5 yrs WPS bifurcated as 2 yrs IC, 3 yrs ES
                          Ct 5 - Total sentence is 2 yrs WPS bifurcated as 1 yr IC, 1 yr ES/STAYED. 3 yrs probation
         15CF680, Ct 1 - Total sentence is 2 ys WPS bifurcated as 1 yr IC, 1 yr ES conc with Cts 1 & 2 in 15CF576

Conditions:
obey all rules and regs
costs including Domestic abuse assessment
DNA sample & costs in Cts 2 in 15CF576 and 15CF680
no alc/cs except by Rx-UA's
any counseling deemed approp by agent; specifically AODA assessment, treatment and after care as well as psych eval and cooperate with treatment plan
No contact with victim unless approved by agent and victim

FAW/vote

NOT eligible for CIP or SAP

Status conference on May 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on April 23, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Marques E Zarate in court with attorney Joshua Hargrove.  Defendant Marques E Zarate in custody.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 23, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for May 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.
